title: Prevention and Management of Neonatal Exudative Skin Injury: Technology-Enhanced Inquiry-Based Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary neonatal nursing knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targets current practitioners, aiming to enhance knowledge acquisition and practical skills through learning content based on real clinical cases and interactive online activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain prevention strategies for neonatal exudate injury with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully identify early symptoms of exudate injury and perform appropriate initial response procedures in a simulated environment three consecutive times.
Learners can critically analyze the scientific rationale of exudate management protocols through inquiry-based activities within the LMS.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
